text: == Events == * The Umayyad Empire was established. * In the year 660 the kingdom of Silla invaded the kingdom of Baekje. (see Korea) * Empress Saimei of Japan makes an order to dispatch a force to the Korean Peninsula to save Baekje. == Births == * Yamanoue no Okura, Japanese poet (d. 733) (see: Waka)
